title: Mud Bud
summaries: The Mud Bud is a pet-summoning item, which can be purchased from the Zoologist with 50 after defeating Plantera. It summons Plantero, a miniature version of Plantera, that follows the player. The pet keeps pace with the player by flying in a manner similar to Plantera's second form.

statistics.Buy: 50
